paper_abstract: The paper entitled "An extreme case of the generalized optimal discriminant transformation and its application to face recognition" [X.J. Wu, J.P. Lu, J.Y. Yang, S.T. Wang, J. Kittler, An extreme case of the generalized optimal discriminant transformation and its application to face recognition, Neurocomputing 70(4-6) (2007) 828-834] contains several flaws. The main one is corrected in this note. (c) 2008 Elsevier B.V. All rights reserved.
paper_title: A note on an extreme case of the generalized optimal discriminant transformation
